reviews.name: Jane Smith
reviews.content: The quality is amazing. Highly recommended!

feeStructure.description: Per semester fee for clubs and activities

facultyMembers.name: Director
facultyMembers.description: Education is a lifelong process which is to be nurtured with love and care. It must be built on a firm and broad foundation for students to excel in life.

facultyMembers.name: Chairman
facultyMembers.description: A child's mind is like a fertile soil - rich, vibrant with life and eager to absorb every experience that comes within his or her universe.

facultyMembers.name: Principal
facultyMembers.description: DPS Hyderabad aim to preserve and enhance highest standard of excellence to match up at every stage.

facultyMembers.name: Vice Principal
facultyMembers.description: Education is a lifelong process which is to be nurtured with love and care. It must be built on a firmand broad foundation for students to excel in life.

schoolInfo.info1: Delhi Public School (also known as DPS) is the largest public school institution in India. The classes are from Nursery to Class XII (Science, Arts, and Commerce). Once affiliated to CBSE, the school chain is currently running independently and not under any board as of December 2022.
schoolInfo.info2: The DPS Society is a non-profit, non-proprietary, private, educational organization. This Global Network of over 200 English medium, co-educational, secular schools provides education from Pre-Nursery/Nursery to Class XII.
schoolInfo.info3: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.
